feat.value: A brother went to Apa Sisoes at the mountain of Apa Antonius and they said to Apa Sisoes,
You have not yet reached the measure of Apa Antonius, father.
He said to them, 'Where (would this come) from?
If I have a single thought of Apa Antonius, I would be completely on fire.
However, I saw a man who had power to bear his own thought with difficulty.'
